title: Level up
content:
* Corporal Binns has told the player to:
 * Talk to Robyn Nockright in the Training Ground to do bow training.
 * A Guard level of 15 is required to start bow training.
 * Get the total Hopeport Level to 60.
 * and then report back to Corporal Binns for more training, which will start the Hide and seek quest.


 * Access to Hopeforest
 * 16,100 Guard XP
 * 9 silver 600 copper from Marcus Mint.
